name: Output Pasture
description:
• Simple operation with your mouse only
  • Unlock over 100 kinds of animals an skill cards step by step; it makes you experience novelty from different combinations in every adventure
  • You have encountered over 50 events; Have they brought something good… or bad?
  • Complete achievements to get unique cards
  • Explore each unique battle scene on the map
  • Defeat powerful boss to get rare cards
  • Complete the collections by meeting characters and skills
